mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.artno AS "artno", a.logo AS "logo", a.sort AS "sort", a.market_price AS "marketPrice", a.price AS "price", a.brand_id AS "brand.id", b.name AS "brand.name", a.state AS "state", a.spec1 AS "spec1", a.spec2 AS "spec2", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.imgs AS "imgs", a.sales AS "sales", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", s.name AS "supplier.name", s.id AS "supplier.id", a.pass AS "pass"
left join s_brand b on b.id=a.brand_id left join s_supplier s on s.id=a.supplier_id
mapper.select:
SELECT s.name AS "supplier.name", s.id AS "supplier.id", a.name AS "name", a.artno AS "artno", a.logo AS "logo", a.market_price AS "marketPrice", a.price AS "price", sku.spec1 AS "spec1", sku.spec2 AS "spec2", sku.id as "id", sku.settlement_price AS "settlementPrice" FROM s_goods a
left join s_goods_sku sku on a.id =sku.goods_id WHERE a.artno = #{artno} and a.pass='1' and a.state='1' and (sku.spec1=#{spec1} or sku.spec2=#{spec1} ) and a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_goods( id, name, artno, logo, sort, market_price, price, brand_id, state, spec1, spec2, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, imgs, sales, del_flag, supplier_id, pass ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{artno}, #{logo}, #{sort}, #{marketPrice}, #{price}, #{brand.id}, #{state}, #{spec1}, #{spec2}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{imgs}, #{sales}, #{delFlag}, #{supplier.id}, #{pass} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_goods SET name = #{name}, artno = #{artno}, logo = #{logo}, sort = #{sort}, market_price = #{marketPrice}, price = #{price}, brand_id = #{brand.id}, state = #{state}, spec1 = #{spec1}, state = #{state}, imgs = #{imgs}, sales = #{sales}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, supplier_id=#{supplier.id}, pass=#{pass} WHERE id = #{id}
